scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx nx run knowii:build
scripts.clean:install: pnpm exec rimraf ./package-lock.json && pnpm exec rimraf ./node_modules && npm install
scripts.db:clean: pnpm exec rimraf ./supabase && pnpm exec supabase init
scripts.db:init: pnpm run db:migration:deploy && pnpm run db:seed
scripts.db:migration:deploy: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature
scripts.db:migration:deploy:prod: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.prod -- pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature
scripts.db:migration:prepare: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --preview-feature
scripts.db:migration:status: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma migrate status --preview-feature
scripts.db:migration:status:prod: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.prod -- pnpm exec prisma migrate status --preview-feature
scripts.db:reset: pnpm run db:clean && pnpm run db:start && pnpm run db:init
scripts.db:schema:introspect: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma introspect
scripts.db:schema:introspect:prod: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.prod -- pnpm exec prisma introspect
scripts.db:schema:validate: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma validate
scripts.db:schema:validate:prod: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.prod -- pnpm exec prisma validate
scripts.db:pull: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma db pull
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio:prisma: dotenv -e apps/knowii/.env.local -- pnpm exec prisma studio
scripts.lint: pnpm exec next lint ./apps/knowii && pnpm exec nx workspace-lint  && pnpm run tsc
